# Prison of Blades (WondArch)
## Overview
**Prison of Blades:** A continuously spinning *[[Blade Barrier (Spell)|blade barrier]]* lines every inch of this stronghold spaceâ€™s outer walls, ceiling, and floor. Any creature passing into or out of the *prison of blades* automatically takes 11d6 points of slashing damage.

*Caster Level:* 11th; Prerequisites: [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Blade Barrier (Spell)|blade barrier]]**; Market Price:* 33,000 gp.

**Source:** Stronghold Builders Guidebook (WotC), pg. 82
